CustomField.description: Sum of all (soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Gifts Total (since inception)" for overall sum of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP's Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of all (soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Gifts Total (since inception)" for overall sum of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP's Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Total Soft Credits
